column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A Toyota Prius smashed into a central divider at 11:30 pm on April 1
column6: near Orussey Market.------Witnesses at the scene said that prior to the incident
column7: an unidentified male driver in a silver Prius was driving along St. 182 in a westbound direction at speed.------After crashing into the yellow and black concrete
column8: the driver got out the car and vanished into the night.------After the incident
column9: local authorities visited the site and took the Toyota to the  Phnom Penh Municipal Road Traffic Office in order to find the owner to deal with the legal process. ------POST NEWS
